title: Appeal Financial Aid Decision
description: A student's family has had a recent change in financial circumstances (e.g., job loss) and they want to appeal for more financial aid.

tasks.description: Identify the student and their current financial aid award.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student's identity and current aid package.

tasks.description: Explain the financial aid appeal process (professional judgment) and the types of documentation required.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the process and required proof (e.g., termination letter).

tasks.description: Provide the student with the appeal form and a secure link to upload their documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the necessary resources for the student to submit their appeal.
